testcase.classname: Login to Ymail and fetch mails with the subject of searched text
testcase.name: Login with correct credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to "https://login.yahoo.com/?.src=ym&.lang=en-US&.intl=us&.done=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fd" site.passed When user enters email address as "owaishmustafa@ymail.com".................passed Then user clicks on the next button.........................................passed When user enters password as "Bissi2019!"...................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed And user logged in successfully.............................................passed Then user searches for "Check out delicious lunch options" on the search box.passed Then user clicks on search..................................................passed And user receives search results............................................passed Then user fetches email received on "Oct 3".................................passed Then user fetches email received last "10 days".............................passed
